custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_DiffuEraser
custom_nodes.description: DiffuEraser is a diffusion model for video Inpainting, you can use it in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_CSD_MT
custom_nodes.description: [a/CSD_MT](https://github.com/Snowfallingplum/CSD-MT) is a method about 'Content-Style Decoupling for Unsupervised Makeup Transfer without Generating Pseudo Ground Truth', you can use it in comfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: Extraltodeus
custom_nodes.title: Negative-attention-for-ComfyUI-
custom_nodes.description:
Takes the difference in between the positive and negative conditioning at the attention.
NOTE: Will not work with Flux

custom_nodes.author: magekinnarus
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-V-Prediction-Node
custom_nodes.description: Node to set v-prediction sampling when using SDXL and other models that may not have the necessary metadata to identify it as a v-prediction model. This node is useful for quantized models since they lack the necessary metadata.

custom_nodes.author: raindrop313
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_SD3_Flowedit
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes that support SD3/SD3.5 in FlowEdit

custom_nodes.author: martin-rizzo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TinyBreaker
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-TinyBreaker is a collection of custom nodes specifically designed to generate images using the TinyBreaker model. It's actively developed with ongoing improvements. Although still in progress, these nodes are functional and allow you to explore the potential of the model.

custom_nodes.author: melMass
custom_nodes.title: comfy-oiio
custom_nodes.description: OpenImageIO plugin for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: KLL535
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_PNGInfo_Sidebar
custom_nodes.description: Frontend extension that adds a sidebar for easy viewing of PNG file metadata.

custom_nodes.author: greengerong
custom_nodes.title: Janus-Pro ComfyUI Plugin
custom_nodes.description: This plugin integrates the Janus-Pro multi-modal model into ComfyUI, enabling advanced image understanding and text-to-image generation capabilities. It supports both image analysis and creative image generation workflows.

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Sonic
custom_nodes.description: Sonic is a method about ' Shifting Focus to Global Audio Perception in Portrait Animation',you can use it in comfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: satche
custom_nodes.title: Prompt Factory
custom_nodes.description: A modular system that adds randomness to prompt generation

custom_nodes.author: hdfhssg
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_pxtool
custom_nodes.description:
This is a custom plugin node for ComfyUI that modifies and extends some features from existing projects. The main implementations include:
* Reproducing some features of the [a/Stable-Diffusion-Webui-Civitai-Helper](https://github.com/zixaphir/Stable-Diffusion-Webui-Civitai-Helper) project within ComfyUI
* Implementing a feature to randomly generate related prompt words by referencing the [a/noob-wiki dataset](https://huggingface.co/datasets/Laxhar/noob-wiki/tree/main)

custom_nodes.author: CC-SUN6
custom_nodes.title: ccsun_node
custom_nodes.description: About the comfyui image selector, image adjustment (panning, rotation, zoom), adjust image size to be a multiple of 8

custom_nodes.author: hgabha
custom_nodes.title: WWAA-CustomNodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom Nodes by the team at WeirdWonderfulAI.Art. Line Count, Join String, Dither Image, Image Batch Loader, Prompt Writer

custom_nodes.author: slvslvslv
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Smart Helper Nodes
custom_nodes.description: NODES: Smart HunyuanVideo Lora Select, Smart HunyuanVideo Lora StackSmart Format String, Smart Format String (10 params)

custom_nodes.author: Tr1dae
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Dequality
custom_nodes.description: Simple addition to add noise to an image. Found on reddit

custom_nodes.author: DragonDiffusionbyBoyo
custom_nodes.title: Boyonodes
custom_nodes.description: The Vae node is a sneaky little node perfect for deployment in Schools or work environments where you do not want the kiddywinkles creating NSFW content. Just rename the node to VAE decode and it looks like a normal node but hidden inside is an NSFW detector. Once hidden in the workflow there are no settings to undo the NSFW detection so cannot be worked around unless you remove the node. The node looks innocent once renamed so is virtually undetectable. I have placed an example workflow for you to see how to connect it. Simple stuff really, but once connected just rename.

custom_nodes.author: lldacing
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_BEN_ll
custom_nodes.description: Background removal based on BEN. NODES:LoadRembgByBenModel, RembgByBen, GetMaskByBen, RembgByBenAdvanced, BlurFusionForegroundEstimation.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-JoyHallo_wrapper
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node wrapper for JoyHallo - One-Shot Audio-Driven Talking Head Generation.

custom_nodes.author: gorillaframeai
custom_nodes.title: GF_translate
custom_nodes.description: These custom nodes for ComfyUI provide advanced text translation capabilities using Google Translate. They are designed for seamless integration into the ComfyUI environment, offering users powerful tools for text and JSON file translation tasks.

custom_nodes.author: StarAsh042
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_RollingArtist
custom_nodes.description: RollingArtist is a ComfyUI node designed to generate artist prompt texts with random weights, suitable for text-to-image generation models. The node reads an artist list from a CSV file and generates combined prompts based on the parameters.

custom_nodes.author: Arkanun
custom_nodes.title: ReadCSV_ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: NODES: ReadCSVRowNode

custom_nodes.author: zentrocdot
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Circle_Detection
custom_nodes.description: Next to AI mathematical methods can be used for the detection of objects like a circle.

custom_nodes.author: AiartvnTeam
custom_nodes.title: A2V Multi Image Composite
custom_nodes.description: Node for compositing multiple images with interactive preview and layer management

custom_nodes.author: ProGamerGov
custom_nodes.title: Preview 360 Panorama for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node for interactive 360° panorama image previews. Panoramic 360 images are also sometimes known as VR photography (virtual reality), HDRI environments (ex: skyboxes), image spheres, spherical images, 360 pano, and 360 degree photos.

custom_nodes.author: amorano
custom_nodes.title: Jovi_MIDI
custom_nodes.description: Read and Process data from MIDI devices inside of ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: nkchocoai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DanbooruPromptQuiz
custom_nodes.description: This node is for playing the game of guessing prompts by looking at images generated from prompts output by TIPO, Tagger, etc..

custom_nodes.author: agilly1989
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_agilly1989_motorway
custom_nodes.description: This my implemenation of a `pipe` in ComfyUI. Is it better or worse than others? No idea.

custom_nodes.author: da2el-ai
custom_nodes.title: D2-PromptSelector-comfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This is a version of [a/sd-d2-prompt-selector](https://github.com/da2el-ai/sd-d2-prompt-selector) reworked for ComfyUI. It's just a prototype that I've put together for now. The random syntax of sd-d2-prompt-selector cannot be used; instead, the DynamicPrompt syntax is used

custom_nodes.author: kijai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-StableXWrapper
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI wrapper for [a/StableX normal](https://github.com/Stable-X/StableNormal)/[a/delight](https://github.com/Stable-X/StableDelight) models

custom_nodes.author: GHOSTLXH
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Counternodes
custom_nodes.description: This node group contains a series of ComfyUI nodes with built-in counters and specific output results based on the counter's output, aimed at implementing folder traversal functionality in the ComfyUI frontend. For specific examples, please refer to the sample workflow. Of course, you can also use your imagination to create other interesting things.

custom_nodes.author: gmorks
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Animagine prompt
custom_nodes.description: Comfy UI node to prompt build for [a/https://huggingface.co/cagliostrolab/animagine-xl-4.0](https://huggingface.co/cagliostrolab/animagine-xl-4.0) model

custom_nodes.title: GeoNodes
custom_nodes.description: GIS Processing Nodes for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: checkbins
custom_nodes.title: checkbin-comfy
custom_nodes.description: These nodes allow you to make Checkbin comparisons.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Janus Pro Vision
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node extension that integrates the Janus-Pro-7B vision-language model from DeepSeek AI on your's local computer, enabling powerful image understanding and multi-turn conversation capabilities.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DeepSeek-JanusPro
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-DeepSeek-JanusPro

custom_nodes.description: NODES: Extract Displacement Map Node, Displace Logo

custom_nodes.description: This is a helper extension for ComfyUI that assists with node connections.

custom_nodes.author: yichengup
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Yc_JanusPro
custom_nodes.description:
About DeepSeek Chat API
Go here to register and get the api-key [a/https://platform.deepseek.com/](https://platform.deepseek.com/) Then enter api_key in config.json

custom_nodes.author: chflame163
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Janus_Wrapper
custom_nodes.description: Unofficial implementation of [a/deepseek-ai/Janus](https://github.com/deepseek-ai/Janus) in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: ReBeating
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Artist-Selector
custom_nodes.description: A useful comfyui node named LoadArtistTag for selecting artist tags, including 1000+ single-artist tags and 300 mixed-artists tags.

custom_nodes.author: 852wa
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ColorshiftColor
custom_nodes.description:
This is a custom node for ComfyUI.
It reduces colors based on a specified number and allows for adjustments to hue, saturation, and brightness.
Features:Each parameter can be set to random, You can toggle masking (not changing colors) using color numbers, Mask inversion can also be toggled on or off.

custom_nodes.author: 852wa
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AdvancedAlphaProcessor
custom_nodes.description:
This is a custom node for ComfyUI.
Features:Removes white areas in the input image by making them transparent based on brightness, Outputs in black and transparent, Outputs in gray and transparent.
This is a simple node with the above functionalities implemented. It also supports sequential processing.

custom_nodes.author: jinanlongen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Prompt Expander Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that expands text prompts using the SuperPrompt-v1 T5 model. This node helps generate more detailed and descriptive prompts from simple input text, which can be particularly useful for image generation workflows.

custom_nodes.author: Style-Mosaic
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI DINO-X Detector Node
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node that integrates DINO-X API for object detection and segmentation. This node allows you to detect and segment objects in images using text prompts.

custom_nodes.author: gmorks
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SendToDiscord
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-SendToDiscord is a custom node for ComfyUI that simplifies sending preview images to Discord via webhooks. It supports both single-image uploads and batch mode, making it an efficient tool for sharing your generated images directly with your Discord server.

custom_nodes.author: CY-CHENYUE
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Janus-Pro
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for Janus-Pro, a unified multimodal understanding and generation framework.

custom_nodes.author: burnsbert
custom_nodes.title: EBU LMStudio LLM Integration
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for integrating LM Studio's LLM functionality into ComfyUI. Includes EBU-LMStudio-Load, EBU-LMStudio-Unload, and EBU-LMStudio-Request.

custom_nodes.author: tigeryy2
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Structured Outputs
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for LLM Structured Outputs with integration for prompting

custom_nodes.author: yuvraj108c
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI InvSR
custom_nodes.description: This project is an unofficial ComfyUI implementation of [a/InvSR](https://github.com/zsyOAOA/InvSR) (Arbitrary-steps Image Super-resolution via Diffusion Inversion)

custom_nodes.author: ProGamerGov
custom_nodes.title: PyTorch 360° Image Conversion Toolkit for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for working with and converting between 360 degree equirectangular images, cubemap, and perspective images. Panoramic 360 images are also sometimes known as VR photography (virtual reality), HDRI environments (ex: skyboxes), image spheres, spherical images, 360 pano.

custom_nodes.author: Conor-Collins
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CoCoTools
custom_nodes.description: A set of custom nodes for ComfyUI providing advanced image processing, file handling, and utility functions.

custom_nodes.author: fblissjr
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Dataset Helper & Batch Node
custom_nodes.description: This custom node set for ComfyUI provides a DatasetBatchNode for automated, sequential processing of datasets, particularly useful for iterative training or batched image/video generation workflows.

custom_nodes.author: willmiao
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Lora-Manager
custom_nodes.description: LoRA Manager for ComfyUI - An extension for managing LoRA models with previews and metadata integration.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI DeepSeek_R1 Chat Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that integrates DeepSeek's powerful chat and instruction API, enabling seamless AI interactions within your ComfyUI workflows.

custom_nodes.author: oxysoft
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-gowiththeflow
custom_nodes.description: Implementation of GoWithTheFlow, original code at [a/https://github.com/Eyeline-Research/Go-with-the-Flow/](https://github.com/Eyeline-Research/Go-with-the-Flow/) and [a/https://github.com/RyannDaGreat/CommonSource/blob/master/noise_warp.py](https://github.com/RyannDaGreat/CommonSource/blob/master/noise_warp.py)

custom_nodes.author: Mattabyte
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Secure API Call
custom_nodes.description: This package provides custom nodes to ComfyUI to POST data to a secure API.

custom_nodes.author: Dr.Positliver
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-zegr
custom_nodes.description: comfyui share models to oss conveniently.

custom_nodes.author: danielw
custom_nodes.title: Custom nodes for llm chat with optional image input
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that enables Large Language Model (LLM) chat interactions with optional image input support.

custom_nodes.author: JohnDoeSmithee
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SoX-Mixdown
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node for sox's mixdown function such as 'sox --combine inputfile1.wav inputfile2.wav outputfile.wav'.

custom_nodes.author: yuvraj108c
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Video Depth Anything
custom_nodes.description: This project is an unofficial ComfyUI implementation of [a/Video Depth Anything](https://github.com/DepthAnything/Video-Depth-Anything), for depth estimation on long videos without compromising quality, consistency, or generalization ability.

custom_nodes.author: EnragedAntelope
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-EACloudNodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of ComfyUI custom nodes for interacting with various cloud services. These nodes are designed to work with any ComfyUI instance, including cloud-hosted environments (such as MimicPC) where users may have limited system access.

custom_nodes.author: smlbiobot
custom_nodes.title: sml-comfyui-prompt-expansion
custom_nodes.description: Prompt Expansion for Stable Diffusion, using Deepseek API.

custom_nodes.author: spacepxl
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LossTesting
custom_nodes.description: Basic utility for testing diffusion model loss across the timestep schedule. Should work with any native models that use ksampler. This could be used for comparing models, testing captions on an image, etc.

custom_nodes.author: JTriggerFish
custom_nodes.title: Comfy Latent Tools
custom_nodes.description: A set of tools for manipulating latent tensors in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: bradsec
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_StringEssentials
custom_nodes.description: Essential string manipulation nodes for ComfyUI.
